title: Woman's skirt
description: resist-dyed; Wele design:  striped pattern of groups of two or three solid stripes, with one variation of two dashed stripes enclosed by two solid stripes; one lone edge is printed with a row of triangles.; natural and brown stripes; collected Dec.12,1986; made by Nampere
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
